titles.title: A resolution expressing profound concern, deepest sympathies, and solidarity on behalf of the people of the United States to the people and Government of Chile following the massive earthquake.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.
Senate Committee on Foreign Relations discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 3/4/2010--Passed Senate without amendment. Expresses deepest sympathies and solidarity to the people and government of Chile following the massive earthquake of February 27, 2010. Applauds the friendship between the governments and people of the United States and Chile and recommits to cooperation in bilateral, multilateral, and Hemispheric contexts. Encourages: (1) the U.S. government to offer all appropriate assistance to aid in the government of Chile's rescue and recovery efforts; and (2) the international community to join in relief efforts.
